name: npm-build-tool
description: How to Use npm as a Build Tool

scripts.lint: npm run lint:js:src && npm run lint:js:test
scripts.build: npm run build:js && npm run build:css && npm run build:markup
scripts.build:watch: parallelshell 'npm run build:js:watch' 'npm run build:css:watch' 'npm run build:markup:watch'
scripts.build:js: browserify -d assets/scripts/my-module.js -p [minifyify --compressPath . --map main.min.js.map --output dist/main.min.js.map] | hashmark -n dist/main.min.js -s -l 8 -m assets.json 'dist/{name}.min.{hash}{ext}' && npm run build:markup
scripts.build:js:watch: watch 'npm run clean:js && npm run build:js' assets/scripts/
scripts.build:css: stylus -u autoprefixer-stylus -p assets/styles/main.styl | cssmin > dist/main.min.css && hashmark -s -l 8 -m assets.json dist/main.min.css 'dist/{name}.{hash}{ext}' && npm run build:markup
scripts.build:css:watch: watch 'npm run clean:css && npm run build:css' assets/styles/
scripts.dev: npm run open:dev -s && parallelshell 'npm run live-reload' 'npm run serve' 'npm run build:watch'

author: Alberto Cubero Navas
